security_audit.summary: This is a pure template skill containing only markdown documentation. No executable code, scripts, network calls, or filesystem access capabilities are present. The skill consists solely of a YAML frontmatter and placeholder text.

content.value_statement: This template provides a starting point for creating custom Claude skills. It includes a standardized format for defining skill metadata and instructions. Use this template to build new skills quickly.
actual_capabilities: Documents skill purpose and usage instructions
Serves as starting point for new skills
limitations: Requires customization to become a working skill

best_practices: Fill in all required YAML frontmatter fields clearly
Provide specific instructions on when to use the skill
Include examples of effective prompts in the instructions
Test the skill with various inputs before publishing
anti_patterns: Leaving placeholder text in published skills
Omitting the YAML frontmatter or required fields
Creating skills without clear use cases

faq.question: What tools support this skill format?
faq.answer: This template works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Check individual tool documentation for compatibility.

faq.question: What are the file size limits?
faq.answer: Template files are minimal. Actual skills should keep instructions under reasonable length for best performance.

faq.question: How do I integrate this with my workflow?
faq.answer: Copy the template file, customize the YAML frontmatter and instructions, then add to your skills directory.

faq.question: Is my data safe with this template?
faq.answer: This template contains no executable code. No data is collected or transmitted. Only your custom content is used.

faq.question: Why is my skill not working?
faq.answer: Ensure YAML frontmatter is valid, required fields are filled, and instructions are clear and specific.

faq.question: How does this compare to other skill formats?
faq.answer: This template follows standard markdown with YAML frontmatter, compatible with most AI assistant skill systems.
